text: Nicholas Paul Punto (born November 8, 1977) is an American major league baseball player. He plays for the Los Angeles Dodgers. Punnto was born in San Diego, California. He used to play for the Boston Red Sox. ==References== == Other websites == *Nick Punto at Baseball-Reference.com Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Sportspeople from San Diego
title: Nick Punto
